title: Webinar Events - Content Fragments
description: JSON data for AEM Content Fragments based on the 'webinarEvent' model.

webinarEvents.webinarTitle: Online panel discussion - Hear from your peers on how to manage open access complexity
webinarEvents.webinarDescription: Join our panel of experts to discuss the challenges and solutions for managing open access publishing in today's complex landscape.

webinarEvents.webinarTitle: The role and impact of public policies - OSTP and other open research mandates
webinarEvents.webinarDescription: Explore the impact of recent open research mandates, including the OSTP memo, on the future of scholarly publishing.

webinarEvents.webinarTitle: The open access advantage - How open access improves your impact
webinarEvents.webinarDescription: Learn how publishing your work open access can significantly increase its visibility, citation rate, and overall impact.

webinarEvents.webinarTitle: How to improve open access management across different publishers
webinarEvents.webinarDescription: A practical guide for librarians on streamlining open access workflows and managing agreements with multiple publishers.

webinarEvents.webinarTitle: Understanding the OA output of your institution
webinarEvents.webinarDescription: Discover tools and techniques for tracking and analyzing your institution's open access research output to inform your strategy.
